name: Plynx Singula, Meditation Game
description:
Our mission is to make the world more harmonious and beautiful. We like to share a high quality immersive experience with you. Plynx is an enchanting universe with spacious sounds and visual effects. We believe that the process of making electronic music is magical.

Plynx is an audiovisual instrument controlled by device motion.

How to play Plynx
- Sit or stand, keep your back straight
- Hold your device flat in both hands
- Relax, balance, and focus
- Drift through space and play the singing bells
- Find your flow
- Train your focus by avoiding the edges
- Feel the calming effect of the sounds
